NK017(tsa)007:0: skyabs rje rin po che'i gsung las 'phros pa'i dbang bzhi'i rnam bshad rin chen phung po bzhugs /
NK017(tsa)007:1: ma ni pad+me h'u h+r+aih sangs rgyas kun 'dus mgon po spyan ras gzigs //
NK017(tsa)007:2: gang dang dbyer med drin can chos kyi rje //
NK017(tsa)007:3: rtsa ba'i bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK017(tsa)007:4: dbang bzhi'i go don nyung gsal bri bar 'dod //
NK017(tsa)007:5: de la spyir skal pa mchog dang ldan pa'i gang
NK017(tsa)007:6: zag tshe gcig gis mgon po rdo rje 'chang gi
NK017(tsa)007:7: go 'phang thob par 'dod pa'i blo rab gsang sngags
NK017(tsa)007:8: rdo rje theg pa'i lam la slob par 'dod pa
NK017(tsa)007:9: dag gi dang po'i 'jug sgo ma nor ba ni
NK017(tsa)007:10: smin byed dbang bskur ba nyid yin te /
NK017(tsa)007:13: e ma rin chen dbang dang bral ba'i skyes bu ni //
NK017(tsa)007:14: gdol ba dman pa zhig gis rgyal por re smon bzhin //
NK017(tsa)007:17: dbang ma bskur bar dngos grub med //
NK017(tsa)007:18: bye ma btsir las zhun mar bzhin //
NK017(tsa)007:20: dbang bskur ma thob par gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i lam bskyed rdzogs dang /
NK017(tsa)007:21: grogs bsnyen bsgrub sogs gang la bslab kyang gsang sngags
NK017(tsa)007:22: rang nyid len pa'i nyes pa 'byung zhing mkha' 'gro
NK017(tsa)007:23: dang grub pa can dag gis bsad nas sems can
NK017(tsa)007:25: bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa las dbang bzhi
NK017(tsa)007:26: tshul dang mthun pa zhig thob phan chad rab dbang
NK017(tsa)007:27: bskur gyi dus de nyid du smin grol chig chod
NK017(tsa)007:28: du gyur nas mchog gi dngos grub thob pa'ang yod
NK017(tsa)007:29: / 'bring nyams len bskyed rdzogs la 'bad pas tshe 'dir mchog grub pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:30: tha ma yang dam tshig ma nyams na tshe rabs
NK017(tsa)007:31: gzhan du rdo rje theg pa'i chos dang bla ma
NK017(tsa)007:32: yang dag pa 'jal zhing rjes su bzung nas grol
NK017(tsa)007:34: dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na //
NK017(tsa)007:35: skye zhing skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur //
NK017(tsa)007:36: de yi skye ba bdun na ni //
NK017(tsa)007:37: ma bsgom par yang dngos grub 'thob //
NK017(tsa)007:39: dbang bskur ba de yang spyir rgyud sde'i rnam grangs
NK017(tsa)007:40: dang bstun pa'i grangs dang dbye sgo mi 'dra ba
NK017(tsa)007:41: du ma yod kyang thams cad mdor bsdu na gsang
NK017(tsa)007:42: sngags phyi nang thun mong du gyur pa thun mong
NK017(tsa)007:44: nang rgyud bla na med pa'i thun mong ma yin
NK017(tsa)007:45: pa gsang ba zab mo'i dbang gsum ste brgyad po
NK017(tsa)007:47: 'on kyang bla med kyi bum dbang ni spyir yi
NK017(tsa)007:48: dam gyi lha'i bskyed rim sgom bzlas phyi'i rnal 'byor
NK017(tsa)007:49: la dbang bar byed pa yin pas thun mong rig
NK017(tsa)007:50: pa'i dbang lnga dang rnam pa mtshungs pa tsam yin
NK017(tsa)007:51: mod kyang don du 'chad 'gyur ltar gang du bskur
NK017(tsa)007:52: ba'i dkyil 'khor / ji ltar bskur ba'i thabs /
NK017(tsa)007:54: ci'i phyir bskur ba'i dgos pa rnams mi 'dra bas
NK017(tsa)007:55: phyi rgyud kyi thun mong rig pa'i dbang lnga tsam
NK017(tsa)007:56: gyis bla med gyis bum dbang thun mong ma yin
NK017(tsa)007:58: gnas skabs yi dam gyi lha ngo bstan nas sgom
NK017(tsa)007:59: bzlas la dbang bar byed pa tsam bum dbang gi
NK017(tsa)007:60: zhor la 'du bas thun mong rig pa'i dbang lnga
NK017(tsa)007:61: yang bum dbang gi yan lag lta bur 'gyur zhing
NK017(tsa)007:62: der 'du bas / mdor na gsang sngags rdo rje
NK017(tsa)007:63: theg pa'i dbang bskur thams cad dbang bzhir 'dus pa
NK017(tsa)007:64: der 'du bas / yin no // dbang bzhi po
NK017(tsa)007:65: de yang gang du bskur ba'i dbang rang rang la
NK017(tsa)007:66: ltos pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro ba can yin
NK017(tsa)007:67: gyis dkyil 'khor la ma brten par dbang bskur ba
NK017(tsa)007:71: rdo rje 'chang gis bshad pa ste //
NK017(tsa)007:73: de nas dang po bum pa'i dbang gang du bskur
NK017(tsa)007:74: ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gsum ste spros pa la dga'
NK017(tsa)007:75: bas rgyas par rdul mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten
NK017(tsa)007:76: pa dang / spros pa 'bring gi dbang du byas
NK017(tsa)007:77: na ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor la bsten pa dang
NK017(tsa)007:78: pa dang / / blo rab spros dang bral ba'i
NK017(tsa)007:79: dbang du slob dpon lus kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug
NK017(tsa)007:80: pa dang / / pa'ang yod de / dril bu pas /
NK017(tsa)007:81: bcos ma gnyis kyi ngo bo gang //
NK017(tsa)007:82: de ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'dod //
NK017(tsa)007:83: mkhas pas bsgrub bya de ma yin //
NK017(tsa)007:84: ces pa rdul mtshon dang ras bris gnyis gdul bya
NK017(tsa)007:85: blo dman pa'i dbang du byas kyi mkhas pas don
NK017(tsa)007:86: du gnyer bya ma yin par bstan nas /
NK017(tsa)007:87: blo rab kyi ngor 'gro ba 'di kun rang bzhin gyi /
NK017(tsa)007:88: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:89: zhes gsungs zhing rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas 'jug par bshad pa'ang yod mod /
NK017(tsa)007:90: blo 'bring man chad las dang po rnams ni dang
NK017(tsa)007:91: po dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par dbang bskur du
NK017(tsa)007:92: mi rung bas dang po dkyiil 'khor du 'jug pa
NK017(tsa)007:93: gal che zhing de la dang po dkyil 'khor med
NK017(tsa)007:94: par 'jug tu mi rung bas dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa
NK017(tsa)007:95: dang / sgrub cing mchod pa gal che'o //
NK017(tsa)007:96: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa de la'ang rgyas par rdul tshon
NK017(tsa)007:97: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas na sa chog
NK017(tsa)007:98: dang sta gon dkyil 'khor sgrub pa sogs yan lag
NK017(tsa)007:100: ras bris las chog gi yan lag 'ga' zhig med
NK017(tsa)007:101: kyang chog pa'ang yod mod kyi gzhan phal cher nges
NK017(tsa)007:102: par dgos shing gang ltar yang cho ga'i yan lag
NK017(tsa)007:103: ma tshang na slob ma'i rgyud smin par mi nus
NK017(tsa)007:104: shing slob dpon la'ang nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur
NK017(tsa)007:105: bas cho ga'i yan lag rnams tshang par byed pa
NK017(tsa)007:106: ni cis kyang gal che ba yin no //
NK017(tsa)007:107: dbang bskur ba dngos la dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:108: zhugs pa la dbang bskur ba gnyis /
NK017(tsa)007:109: dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la yang slob dpon rang nyid 'jug pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:110: slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa gnyis /
NK017(tsa)007:112: slob dpon rang nyid 'jug pa ni rgyas par slob
NK017(tsa)007:113: ma dbang ji ltar bskur ba'i tshul du bdag 'jug
NK017(tsa)007:114: blang ba dang / bsdu na rig pa'i me tog dor ba tsam gyis kyang chog ste /
NK017(tsa)007:116: kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /
NK017(tsa)007:117: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
NK017(tsa)007:119: gnyis pa slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa la phyi 'jug dang nang 'jug gnyis /
NK017(tsa)007:120: dang po phyi 'jug gi sngon du 'gro ba ni
NK017(tsa)007:121: sdig sgrib sbyangs pa'i phyir yi ge brgya pa'i khrus
NK017(tsa)007:122: nas 'don pa / bar chad bsal pa'i phyir bgegs bskrad cing mtshams bcad pa /
NK017(tsa)007:123: chos la yid ches bskyed pa'i phyir lo rgyus kyi spro ba bskyed pa /
NK017(tsa)007:124: bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i phyir man+dala dbul ba /
NK017(tsa)007:125: bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin pa'i phyir skyabs 'gro 'bog pa /
NK017(tsa)007:126: theg chen gyi lam du tshud pa'i phyir byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa /
NK017(tsa)007:127: dbang gi snod rung du gyur pa'i phyir dam tshig rnams bsrung bar khas len pa /
NK017(tsa)007:128: chos la don gnyer gyi 'dun pa gsal ba'i phyir
NK017(tsa)007:129: dbang don du gsol ba 'debs pa rnams med du
NK017(tsa)007:130: mi rung ba'i yan lag yin pas tshig don ma
NK017(tsa)007:131: 'dzol ba gnad du 'gro bar byas nas /
NK017(tsa)007:132: phyi 'jug dngos la dkyil 'khor du gzhugs par gsol ba 'debs pa /
NK017(tsa)007:135: lha ngo bstan pa rnams te /
NK017(tsa)007:136: 'di'i don ni tshe rabs sngon nas rang dang 'brel
NK017(tsa)007:137: che ba'i yi dam gyi lha gang yin pa de
NK017(tsa)007:138: ngos bzung nas lha de nyid kyi bsgom bya'i dkyil
NK017(tsa)007:139: 'khor dang sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa brda'
NK017(tsa)007:140: don rtags gsum dang bcas pa ngo sprod pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:141: gzhan yang me tog dbus su babs na rdo rje'i rigs /
NK017(tsa)007:142: shar du sangs rgyas rigs sogs rang gi me tog
NK017(tsa)007:143: gang la babs pa'i rigs de nyid gtso bor byas
NK017(tsa)007:144: nas bsgrub na nye ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
NK017(tsa)007:145: tshe rabs kyi lha skal yin pas 'grub thag nye
NK017(tsa)007:146: ba dang / dam tshig bsrung mtshams kyi skabs su'ang
NK017(tsa)007:147: rang rig gi dam tshig gtso bor bsrungs shing gzhan
NK017(tsa)007:148: rnams zhar byung tsam du ci nus su 'bad pa'o
NK017(tsa)007:149: ba dang / // lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi rnam dag gam brda' don bshad pa ni /
NK017(tsa)007:150: yi dam gyi lha gtso 'khor dang gzhal yas khang
NK017(tsa)007:151: gi rnam par snang ba de yang mtshan ma phyag
NK017(tsa)007:152: dang bcas pa'i lha rang rgyud pa de lta bu
NK017(tsa)007:153: zhig gnyer na yod pa ma yin gyi /
NK017(tsa)007:154: rang rgyud kyi phung po lnga po 'di'i rang bzhin
NK017(tsa)007:155: ye nas rgyal ba rig lngar gnas pa sogs gzhi
NK017(tsa)007:156: rang bzhin lhun grub kyi lha ngo sprod pa dang
NK017(tsa)007:157: / lam thabs dang shes rab pha rol phyin drug
NK017(tsa)007:158: byang phyogs bdun la sogs de dag gi dag pa
NK017(tsa)007:159: dang sbyar nas lam mtshon pa rtags kyi lha ngo
NK017(tsa)007:160: / sprad pa dang / mthar thug ye shes lnga dang /
NK017(tsa)007:161: snang stong dbyer med sku gsum sku lnga la sogs
NK017(tsa)007:162: dag pa dang sbyang nas bshad pas 'bras bu ye
NK017(tsa)007:163: shes phyag rgya'i lha ngo sprad pa ste /
NK017(tsa)007:164: gang ltar yang lha dang dkyil 'khor du snang ba
NK017(tsa)007:165: de yang gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos de dang de
NK017(tsa)007:166: dag gi dbyibs dang kha dog dang grangs kyi rnam
NK017(tsa)007:167: grangs de dang de lta bus mtshon par byas nas
NK017(tsa)007:168: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i thabs mkhas kyi sgo
NK017(tsa)007:169: nas lha'i rnam pa tsam lam du byas nas bsgom
NK017(tsa)007:170: pa yin gyis rang las rgyud tha dad pa'i lha
NK017(tsa)007:171: de dang lta bu mchod na mnyes shing dngos grub
NK017(tsa)007:172: sbyin pa'i lha phyi rol pa'i dbang phyug dang khyab
NK017(tsa)007:173: 'jug la sogs pa lta bu zhig gzhan na med
NK017(tsa)007:174: pa ngo sprod pa yin no //
NK017(tsa)007:175: gnyis pa nang 'jug ni ye shes 'bebs pa ste /
NK017(tsa)007:176: slob dpon gyi bskyed rdzogs dang slob ma'i mos pa
NK017(tsa)007:177: la brten nas rtogs pa'i ye shes btsan thabs su
NK017(tsa)007:178: bskyed cing yi dam gyi lhas byin gyis barlobasa pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:179: rten 'brel sgrig pa ste gzhung rang rang nas 'byung
NK017(tsa)007:180: ba ltar byin phebs pa'i rtags ma byung bar bya
NK017(tsa)007:181: zhing / rtags ji bzhin ma byung na spog chog bya ba sogs kyis rtags thon du bya ba'o //
NK017(tsa)007:182: gnyis pa dbang dngos gzhi la /
NK017(tsa)007:183: rgyud sde 'og ma dang thun mong pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:184: bla med kyi rgyud kyi thun mong ma yin pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:185: dang po thun mong pa la spyir dbye bsdu mang du yod kyang /
NK017(tsa)007:186: da lta'i yongs grags kyi dbang du byas na /
NK017(tsa)007:188: rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang dang bdun no //
NK017(tsa)007:189: slob ma'i dbang drug gi dang po mi bskyod pa chu'i dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:190: lha zhu ba'i rang bzhin rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu
NK017(tsa)007:191: spyi bo nas blugs shing khrus byas pas las nyon
NK017(tsa)007:192: bag chags sdig sgrib dang bcas pa thams cad byang
NK017(tsa)007:193: zhing dag nas chu'i lhag ma spyi bor 'khyil ba
NK017(tsa)007:194: las spyi gtsug tu rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje
NK017(tsa)007:195: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam pas /
NK017(tsa)007:196: nyon mongs pa zhe sdang dag /
NK017(tsa)007:197: rnam shes kyi phung po rdo rje mi bskyod pa
NK017(tsa)007:198: dang nam mkha'i khams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
NK017(tsa)007:199: ma'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas /
NK017(tsa)007:200: me long lta bu'i ye shes mngon du byas par mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:201: gnyis pa rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan gyi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:202: rin 'byung gi rang bzhin can gyi dbu brgyan mgo la bcing pas nyon mongs pa nga rgyal dag /
NK017(tsa)007:203: tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan dang chu khams ma ma ki'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas /
NK017(tsa)007:204: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon du byas par mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:205: gsum pa snang ba mtha' yas rdo rje'i dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:206: snang mtha'i rang bzhin rdo rje lag g.yas su gtad pas /
NK017(tsa)007:208: 'du shes kyi phung po snang ba mtha' yas dang
NK017(tsa)007:209: me khams gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas
NK017(tsa)007:210: / so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes mngon du byas par mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:211: bzhi pa don yod grub pa dril bu'i dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:212: don grub kyi rang bzhin dril bu lag g.yon du gtad pas nyon mongs pa phrag dog dag /
NK017(tsa)007:213: 'du byed kyi phung po don yod grub pa dang
NK017(tsa)007:214: rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'i rang bzhin du sangs
NK017(tsa)007:215: rgyas / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mngon du byas par mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:216: lnga pa rnam par snang mdzad ming gi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:217: rang gi me tog gang la phog pa'i rigs dang
NK017(tsa)007:218: mthun pa'i ming btags nas brjod pas nyon mongs pa
NK017(tsa)007:219: gti mug dag / gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad dang /
NK017(tsa)007:220: sa khams sangs rgyas spyan ma'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas /
NK017(tsa)007:221: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mngon du byas par mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:222: drug pa rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:223: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i lam nyams su len
NK017(tsa)007:224: pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i brtul zhugs dang mthun
NK017(tsa)007:225: par nyams su len dgos pas thabs dang shes rab
NK017(tsa)007:226: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin rdor dril lag tu
NK017(tsa)007:227: gtad nas thabs shes zung 'jug gi lam nyams su
NK017(tsa)007:228: len par rjes su gdams pas phyi gzung ba yul
NK017(tsa)007:229: dang nang 'dzin pa sems kyi rnam par rtog pa
NK017(tsa)007:230: thams cad gnas dag thabs rdo rje sems dpa' snang
NK017(tsa)007:231: stong dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i nyams
NK017(tsa)007:232: len la dbang bar byas pa ste slob ma'i dbang
NK017(tsa)007:233: drug go // slob dpon gyi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:234: slob ma gzhan du don nus pa la dmigs bsal du bskur ba ste /
NK017(tsa)007:235: slob ma seng ge'i khri la bkod nas dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni /
NK017(tsa)007:236: phyag rgya sku'i dam tshig yi dam gyi lha yab yum gyi skur bsgom du bcug nas /
NK017(tsa)007:237: dril bu gsung gi dam tshig lag g.yon du gtad cing /
NK017(tsa)007:238: rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig lag g.yas su sbyin
NK017(tsa)007:239: pas phyi mtshan ma rdzas kyi rdol dril dam tshig
NK017(tsa)007:240: gi rdzas su gtad pa rdo rje gsor zhing dril
NK017(tsa)007:242: nang mtshon byed rtags kyi rdor dril yab yum gyi
NK017(tsa)007:243: gsang ba mnyam par sbor pas khams dkar dmar zhal
NK017(tsa)007:244: mjal ba'i bde ba rgyud la skyes pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:245: gsang ba mtshon bya don gyi rdor dril bde stong
NK017(tsa)007:246: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gnas lugs phyag rgya
NK017(tsa)007:247: chen po'i ngang du ma bcos par mnyam par bzhag
NK017(tsa)007:248: pas stong nyid kyi ye shes bskyed cing rdo rje
NK017(tsa)007:249: rgyal po'i go sa thob pa ste /
NK017(tsa)007:250: de'i yan lag tu dus de ring nas bzung ste
NK017(tsa)007:251: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i smin grol phrin las
NK017(tsa)007:252: dang bcas pas rang bzhan gyi don rgya chen po
NK017(tsa)007:253: sgrub par mdzod cig ces rjes su gnang ba dang
NK017(tsa)007:254: / nyams len brtson 'grus kyi dbang gis 'di dang
NK017(tsa)007:255: bar do gang rung du me tog phog pa'i rigs
NK017(tsa)007:256: de dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
NK017(tsa)007:258: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun ring po las grol zhing
NK017(tsa)007:259: dam tshig ma nyams na ngan song gsum rgyun chad
NK017(tsa)007:260: pa yin no zhes dbugs dbyung ba dang sangs rgyas
NK017(tsa)007:261: thams cad kyi sras dang byang sems rig pa 'dzin
NK017(tsa)007:262: pa thams cad kyi spun du 'gyur zhing 'khor ba'i
NK017(tsa)007:263: sems can thams cad kyi mgon byed pa yin pas
NK017(tsa)007:264: dga' bar gyis shig ces gzeng bstod pa dang slob
NK017(tsa)007:265: ma rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa
NK017(tsa)007:266: la / mchod pa dang bstod pas mnga' gsol ba la sogs pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:267: des ni lus ngag yid gsum du 'dzin pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa gnas 'gyur /
NK017(tsa)007:268: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i thabs lam nyams su
NK017(tsa)007:269: blang ba las byung ba'i 'bras bu thabs byung rdo
NK017(tsa)007:270: rje 'chang rig bdag drug pa dkyil 'khor thams cad
NK017(tsa)007:271: kyi mnga' bdag dam pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i rten
NK017(tsa)007:273: de dag gis ni dbang bzhi las bum dbang gi
NK017(tsa)007:274: dngos gzhi ste rgyud sde 'og ma dang thun mong
NK017(tsa)007:275: zhes bshad kyang / dag bya dag 'bras dbang don
NK017(tsa)007:276: gyi ye shes ngo sprod pa sogs phal mo che
NK017(tsa)007:277: rgyud sde'i 'og ma las khyad par du 'phags pas
NK017(tsa)007:278: na bla med kyi khyad chos rnams ni thun mong
NK017(tsa)007:280: da lta'i yongs grags kyi dbang chog rnams las rig
NK017(tsa)007:281: dbang lnga la sogs pa'i rjes su bum chu'i dbang
NK017(tsa)007:282: zung du 'byung ba ni spyir rig dbang lnga sogs
NK017(tsa)007:283: bum dbang gi dngos gzhi yin pas re re bzhin
NK017(tsa)007:284: yang bum pa'i chu rjes su 'gro ba can yin
NK017(tsa)007:285: yang 'dir bum pa gcig tu bsdus te thams cad
NK017(tsa)007:286: kyi rjes su bum pa'i chu dbang gcig bskur ba'o
NK017(tsa)007:287: // de'i yan lag tu lha sku phyag rgya'i dbang lha grangs dang mthun par dbang bskur ba dang /
NK017(tsa)007:288: snying po sngags kyi bzlas lung sbyin pa dang /
NK017(tsa)007:289: yo byad longs spyod rdzas kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
NK017(tsa)007:290: phrin las drag po sgrol ba'i dbang la sogs pa
NK017(tsa)007:291: ni cho ga rang rang gi gzhung dang bstun nas
NK017(tsa)007:292: shes par bya ba las 'dir brjod kyi mi lang
NK017(tsa)007:293: ngo // de lta bu'i bum pa'i dbang de gang
NK017(tsa)007:294: du bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rdul mtshon sogs kyi
NK017(tsa)007:295: bris pa rtags kyi dkyil 'khor yin la /
NK017(tsa)007:296: gang gis bskur ba po ni slob dpon dang dgongs
NK017(tsa)007:297: pa dbyer med pa'i mdun rten dkyil 'khor na bzhugs
NK017(tsa)007:298: pa'i lha dang / de las logs su phye ste
NK017(tsa)007:299: slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gnyis pa'i rnam
NK017(tsa)007:300: pas shar sgo na bzhugs par mos pa slob dpon
NK017(tsa)007:301: pa'i lha dang / dngos dang / slob dpon dang
NK017(tsa)007:302: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i dgongs pa gtad de dbyings nas
NK017(tsa)007:303: spyan drangs pa'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dang gshegs
NK017(tsa)007:304: pa'i lha dang / dngos dang / ma / sems dpa' dang sems ma /
NK017(tsa)007:305: khro bo dang khro mo ste gdan gsum tshang ba'i
NK017(tsa)007:306: lha dang bcas pa gsum ka las thob dgos kyang
NK017(tsa)007:307: / dbang gi lag len byed pa po dngos ni dbang lha spyan drangs pa rnams las /
NK017(tsa)007:308: gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad //
NK017(tsa)007:309: gshegs ma rnams kyi bum pa dang dbu rgyan sogs dbang rdzas thogs te dbang bskur /
NK017(tsa)007:310: sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis brjod /
NK017(tsa)007:311: sems ma rnams kyis glu gar bsgyur //
NK017(tsa)007:312: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bskrad de dbang bskur bar mos pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:313: de ltar bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dbang don gyi
NK017(tsa)007:314: ye shes ni phyi snod nang bcud phung po khams
NK017(tsa)007:315: dang skye mched dang bcas pa ye nas dkyil 'khor
NK017(tsa)007:316: gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa ngo 'phrod de 'khor
NK017(tsa)007:317: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med gcig
NK017(tsa)007:318: tu rtogs pas thag gcod pa ste /
NK017(tsa)007:319: blo rab 'bring la ltos pa'i snang srid lha ru
NK017(tsa)007:320: lta ba'i nges shes ni dbang don gyi ye shes
NK017(tsa)007:321: yin la / de lta bu'i ye shes rgyud la skyes na dbang thob pa yin no //
NK017(tsa)007:322: dbang de nyid thob pas lus dang rtsa'i sgrib pa dag /
NK017(tsa)007:323: lam bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la dbang /
NK017(tsa)007:324: 'bras bu sprul pa'i sku 'grub pa'i skal ba rgyud la bzhag pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:325: gnyis pa gsang sngags bla na med pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang ni gsum ste /
NK017(tsa)007:329: dang po gsang dbang gang du bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK017(tsa)007:330: rtsa yi ge b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
NK017(tsa)007:331: bla ma yab yum gyi lus rtsa'i dkyil 'khor du
NK017(tsa)007:332: gnas shing rtsa mdud yi ge'i rnam par ltar du
NK017(tsa)007:333: gnas pas na rtsa yi ge'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya
NK017(tsa)007:334: / yi ge'i rnam pa can gyi rtsa ma dud
NK017(tsa)007:335: de dag tu rlung dang khams kyi dngas ma 'dus
NK017(tsa)007:336: pas mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms par byed
NK017(tsa)007:337: / pa dang / khyad par yab kyi rdo rje
NK017(tsa)007:338: nor bu thabs bde ba chen po wam yig gi
NK017(tsa)007:340: yum gyi mkha' gsang shes rab stong pa nyid e
NK017(tsa)007:341: yig gi rnam par gnas pa ni gsang dbang gang
NK017(tsa)007:342: las len pa'i dkyil 'khor dngos so //
NK017(tsa)007:343: dkyil 'khor 'di gnyis su yab yum gyi rlung sems
NK017(tsa)007:344: dwangs ma'i thig le zhal mjal ba'i skabs su rang
NK017(tsa)007:345: bzhin brgyad bcu'i rtog tshogs thams cad bcom nas rtog
NK017(tsa)007:346: bral bde stong gi ye shes bskyed pas na yi
NK017(tsa)007:347: ge b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
NK017(tsa)007:348: b+ha ga ni bcom pa'i don no //
NK017(tsa)007:349: dbang ji ltar bskur ba'i tshul ni /
NK017(tsa)007:350: nam srod kyi dus su dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs
NK017(tsa)007:351: su bla ma gsung rdo rje longs spyod sku'i rnam
NK017(tsa)007:352: par bzhugs pa la gzungs ma mtshan ldan dang man+dala
NK017(tsa)007:354: slob dpon gyis rjes su gnang ba byin nas mig dar bcing ste yol ba'i phyi rol du bzhag /
NK017(tsa)007:355: bla ma yab yum lhar gsal ba'i mkha' gsang byin
NK017(tsa)007:356: gyis brlabs nas snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba'i rol
NK017(tsa)007:357: mos phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas
NK017(tsa)007:358: pa thams cad bkug ste bla ma yab yum gyi
NK017(tsa)007:359: sku la bstim pa bde chen byang chub sems kyi
NK017(tsa)007:360: rang bzhin du zhu ba nyid mkha' gsang du phabs
NK017(tsa)007:361: te slob bu'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa
NK017(tsa)007:362: dag par bya ba'i phyir rlung gi stobs kyis lan
NK017(tsa)007:363: gsum gyen du ldog ste slar yum mkhar phabs pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:364: dkar dmar 'dres pa'i bdud rtsi de nyid slob bu'i
NK017(tsa)007:365: lce thog tu bzhag pas mgrin pa longs spyod kyi
NK017(tsa)007:366: 'khor lo nas bzung ste rtsa 'khor lo bzhi'i gnas
NK017(tsa)007:367: thams cad rim pa bzhin du gang /
NK017(tsa)007:368: ma dag pa'i rtsa khams kyi yi ge las rlung
NK017(tsa)007:369: gis bskyod pa'i gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog cha
NK017(tsa)007:370: dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyis 'gags /
NK017(tsa)007:371: sems gsal stong gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin thabs
NK017(tsa)007:372: dang byin brlabs la bsten pa'i ye shes brjod pa
NK017(tsa)007:373: dang bral ba de nyid ngo sprod pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:374: de'i dbang don gyi ye shes ni rlung dbu mar
NK017(tsa)007:375: zhugs pa'i thabs kyi drangs pa'i gsal stong dwangs sang
NK017(tsa)007:376: phyed pa'i sems bzo bcos dang bral ba'i ye shes
NK017(tsa)007:377: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:378: de lta bu'i ye shes de slob ma mos gus
NK017(tsa)007:379: kyis snod dang ldan pa dang bla ma thugs rje
NK017(tsa)007:380: can gyi byin rlabs gung 'dzom pa las dkar dmar
NK017(tsa)007:381: byang chub kyi sems rten 'brel rdzas kyi nus pa
NK017(tsa)007:382: la brten te rgyud la nges par skyes na dbang
NK017(tsa)007:384: dbang de thob pas ngag dang rlung gi sgrib pa dag /
NK017(tsa)007:385: lam gtum mo dang sgyu lus la sogs bdag byin
NK017(tsa)007:386: gyis rlobs pa'i rdzogs rim thams cad sgom pa la
NK017(tsa)007:387: dbang / 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon
NK017(tsa)007:388: du byed pa'i skal ba rgyud la bzhag pa yin
NK017(tsa)007:389: dbang / no // gnyis pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:390: gang du bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni kun rdzob byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
NK017(tsa)007:391: slob bu rang nyid kyi lus rdo rje phung po'i
NK017(tsa)007:392: grong khyer dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gnas
NK017(tsa)007:393: pa'i khams bde chen byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar
NK017(tsa)007:394: ni dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i grong khyer gyi tshul du
NK017(tsa)007:395: gnas shing bde stong ye shes kyi snying po len
NK017(tsa)007:397: dkyil 'khor ni man+dala zhes pa'i sgra las drangs na snying po len pa zhes bya'o //
NK017(tsa)007:398: dkyil 'khor de nyid du dbang ji ltar bskur ba'i tshul ni /
NK017(tsa)007:399: nam gung gi dus su dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs
NK017(tsa)007:400: su bla ma thugs rdo rje chos sku'i rnam rol
NK017(tsa)007:401: du bzhugs pa la slob bus man+dala phul nas gsol
NK017(tsa)007:402: ba gdab / bla mas na tshod gzhon shing mtshan
NK017(tsa)007:403: nyid dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya theg pa thun mong
NK017(tsa)007:404: pa'i chos kyis rgyud snod rung du byas shing rdo
NK017(tsa)007:405: rje theg pa'i thabs lam la the tshom med pa
NK017(tsa)007:406: nyid slob ma la gtad de rjes su gnang ba
NK017(tsa)007:407: ba gdab / sbyin / des kyang spro ba dris
NK017(tsa)007:408: nas slob bu'i pang du byon pas slob bu yab
NK017(tsa)007:409: yum gnyis yi dam gyi lhar bsgoms nas mkha' gsang
NK017(tsa)007:410: byin gyis brlabs te snyom par zhugs pas bde ba'i
NK017(tsa)007:411: 'od zer dang slob dpon yab yum gyi byin brlabs
NK017(tsa)007:412: 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba thams
NK017(tsa)007:413: cad bskul te byon nas slob bu la thim /
NK017(tsa)007:414: de nyid phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rkyen
NK017(tsa)007:415: gyis khams byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i ngo bo
NK017(tsa)007:416: zhu ste spyi bo nas mgrin par babs pa dga'
NK017(tsa)007:417: ba / mgrin pa nas snying gar babs pas mchog dga' /
NK017(tsa)007:418: snying gnas lte bar babs pas khyad par dga' ba /
NK017(tsa)007:419: lte ba nas gsang bar babs pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyams su myong zhing /
NK017(tsa)007:420: dkar cha rdo rje nor bu'i rtser byon pas bde
NK017(tsa)007:421: ba chen po'i ye shes kyi ngang du rang bzhin
NK017(tsa)007:422: brgyad cu'i rtogs tshogs thams cad 'gags /
NK017(tsa)007:423: bde bas thabs byas pa'i shes rab stong pa nyid
NK017(tsa)007:424: kyi gnas lugs bzo bcos dang bral ba phyag rgya
NK017(tsa)007:425: chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes shar ba
NK017(tsa)007:427: dbang 'di'i skabs su dbang don gyi ye shes ni
NK017(tsa)007:428: dga' bzhi'i drangs pa'i bde stong gnyis su med pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:429: ye shes sems bcos ma dang bral ba de nyid
NK017(tsa)007:430: / de lta bu'i ye shes ngo 'phrod na dbang thob pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:431: de ltar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas yid dang thig le'i sgrib pa dag /
NK017(tsa)007:432: lam gzhan lus phyag rgya'i lam la brten pa'i rdzogs rim thams cad bsgom pa la dbang /
NK017(tsa)007:433: 'bras bu chos sku 'grub pa'i skal ba rgyud la bzhag pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:434: gsum pa tshig gi dbang ni /
NK017(tsa)007:435: dbang 'di gang du bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ni don
NK017(tsa)007:436: dam byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste
NK017(tsa)007:437: slob bu'i sems rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad rnam
NK017(tsa)007:438: par shes pa'i rang bzhin rig pa ye shes kyi
NK017(tsa)007:439: thig le gnyug ma don gyi chos nyid 'khor 'das
NK017(tsa)007:440: kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i spro gzhi chos nyid
NK017(tsa)007:441: bde gshegs snying po sems nyid ye sangs rgyas pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:442: dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa nyid do //
NK017(tsa)007:443: dkyil 'khor de nyid du dbang ji ltar bskur na
NK017(tsa)007:444: nam tho rangs kyi dus su dkyil 'khor gyi byang
NK017(tsa)007:445: phyogs su bla ma ye shes rdo rje ngo bo
NK017(tsa)007:446: nyid sku'i rnam par bzhugs pa la slob bu man+dala
NK017(tsa)007:448: bla mas slob ma la sngar shes rab ye shes
NK017(tsa)007:449: kyi dus su thig le'i bde ba la brten te
NK017(tsa)007:450: ngo sprad pa'i ye shes de nyid thabs las byung
NK017(tsa)007:451: ba'i dpe'i ye shes da dung nyams zhen gyi sbubs
NK017(tsa)007:452: dang ma bral ba nyid yin pas /
NK017(tsa)007:453: sems rang bab bzo bcos dang bral ba'i gnas lugs
NK017(tsa)007:454: bde gsal mi rtog pa'i nyams kyi zhen pa dang
NK017(tsa)007:455: bral ba'i gnyug ma gshis kyi chos sku rang rig
NK017(tsa)007:456: zang thal rjen pa'i ye shes de nyid dus dang
NK017(tsa)007:457: rnam par thams cad du bral ma myong yang rang
NK017(tsa)007:458: ngo ma shes par yod pa de nyid mtshon pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:459: brda' dang / mtshon byed kyi tshig gis ngo sprod pa ste /
NK017(tsa)007:460: dbang bzhi pa 'di la rnam grangs tsam du dbye na lnga ste /
NK017(tsa)007:461: sngar shes rab ye shes kyii dbang gi skabs su
NK017(tsa)007:462: dga' bzhi lugs 'byung gi mthar khams byang sems rlung
NK017(tsa)007:463: gi stobs kyis gyen du ldog pas lugs ldog gi
NK017(tsa)007:464: dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong ste thig le spyi
NK017(tsa)007:465: bor thim pas dga' ba'i nyams zhen dang bral ba'i
NK017(tsa)007:466: gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de nyid
NK017(tsa)007:467: bla mas tshig tsam gyis ngo sprad pa'i tshig gi
NK017(tsa)007:468: bzhi pa / gal te des ye shes ma skyes
NK017(tsa)007:469: na slar yang phyag rgya dang snyom par zhugs te
NK017(tsa)007:470: dga' bzhi lugs 'byung dang lugs ldog gi thabs la
NK017(tsa)007:471: brten nas ngo sprod pa rten can gyi bzhi pa
NK017(tsa)007:472: blo rab dbang dus sam 'bring man chad la lam
NK017(tsa)007:473: goms pa'i mthu la brten nas mthong lam rnam par
NK017(tsa)007:474: mi rtog pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes te phyag
NK017(tsa)007:475: rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub mngon du byas
NK017(tsa)007:476: nas sems bde gshegs snying po'i chos nyid mngon sum
NK017(tsa)007:477: par rtogs pa ni don gyi bzhi pa /
NK017(tsa)007:478: de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes de nyid da dung
NK017(tsa)007:479: shes sgrib lhag ma sbyang ba'i don du sgom lam
NK017(tsa)007:480: sa dgur yang dang yang du goms 'dris su byed
NK017(tsa)007:481: pa ni lam gyi bzhi pa /
NK017(tsa)007:482: de ltar goms par byas pas lam mthar phyin pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:483: tshe sa bcu rgyun gyi tha ma la sangs rgyas
NK017(tsa)007:484: longs spyod rdzogs sku las 'od zer chen po'i dbang
NK017(tsa)007:485: bskur ba nod pas dkar dmar rlung gsum de nyid
NK017(tsa)007:486: kyi 'gyur bde myong ba'i shes rig dang bcas pa
NK017(tsa)007:487: rgyun chad de dkar cha dag pa sku rdo rje
NK017(tsa)007:488: / dmar cha dag pa gsung rdo rje /
NK017(tsa)007:489: shes rig dag pa thugs rdo rje ste sangs rgyas
NK017(tsa)007:490: thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum gyi go 'phang gang
NK017(tsa)007:491: yin pa mngon du gyur cing chos kyi sku'i dgongs
NK017(tsa)007:492: pa bsal bzhag dang bral ba mngon du byas pa
NK017(tsa)007:493: ni mthar thug 'bras bu'i bzhi pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:494: 'di'i skabs su dbang don gyi ye shes ni da
NK017(tsa)007:495: lta rang gi sems 'khrul rtog 'di nyid kyi chos
NK017(tsa)007:496: nyid dam rang bzhin gyi gnas lugs bzo bcos dang
NK017(tsa)007:498: rang gnas kyi ye shes rang bzhag gi chos sku /
NK017(tsa)007:499: gnyug ma'i gnas lugs don dam pa'i chos nyid nyid
NK017(tsa)007:500: du gnas pa de nyid rang ngo 'phrod na dbang
NK017(tsa)007:501: thob pa'o // de ltar dbang bzhi pa bskur bas
NK017(tsa)007:502: sgo gsum cha mnyam pa'i sgrib pa zhes thog ma
NK017(tsa)007:503: med pa'i dus nas rang rgyud la gnas pa'i lus
NK017(tsa)007:504: ngag yid gsum gyis sa bon phra ba dkar dmar
NK017(tsa)007:505: rlung gsum la brten pa'i snang gsum phra ba'i sgrib
NK017(tsa)007:507: lam gnas lugs phyag rgya chen po'am 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po bsgom pa la dbang /
NK017(tsa)007:508: 'bras bu ngo bo nyid sku thob pa'i skal pa rgyud la bzhag pa'o //
NK017(tsa)007:509: de lta dbang bzhi po de dag gi don po
NK017(tsa)007:510: ni dbang don gyi ye shes de nyid ngo sprod
NK017(tsa)007:511: pa yin pas / gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang mthun
NK017(tsa)007:512: par bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid tshang zhing
NK017(tsa)007:513: dbang ji lta ba bzhin bskur na byin brlabs 'pho
NK017(tsa)007:514: ba'i stobs kyis slob bu la dbang don gyi ye
NK017(tsa)007:516: 'on kyang da lta'i dus su de 'dra ba mi
NK017(tsa)007:517: 'ong bas mos pas spyod pa'i bla slob kyis ni
NK017(tsa)007:518: dbang gi cho ga dang cho ga'i yan lag rnams
NK017(tsa)007:519: sla chos dang rtsing spyod du ma song bar phyag
NK017(tsa)007:520: len la theb par bya zhing gsang dbang sher dbang
NK017(tsa)007:521: gnyis kyang bdud rtsi dang rig tsaka la brten nas
NK017(tsa)007:522: bskur na dmigs pa la do gal du bya nyams
NK017(tsa)007:523: myong dang ye shes tshig gis ngo sprod cing nyams
NK017(tsa)007:524: myong rgyud la ci skyes byas pas rgyud snod rung
NK017(tsa)007:525: du gyur te dam tshig ma nyams shing bskyed rdzogs
NK017(tsa)007:526: kyi lam nyams su blang bas dbang don gyi ye
NK017(tsa)007:527: shes rang rgyud la skye rung gi nus ldan du
NK017(tsa)007:528: gyur na yang dbang thob par bya dgos so //
NK017(tsa)007:529: des na dbang thob pa'i tshad ni dbang don gyi
NK017(tsa)007:530: ye shes de dang de rgyud la skyes pa'am skye
NK017(tsa)007:531: nges kyi nus ldan du byas pas na dbang thob
NK017(tsa)007:532: pa yin no // de'i phyir dbang don gyi ye
NK017(tsa)007:533: shes la nges shes cung zad kyang ma skyes par
NK017(tsa)007:534: dbang bskur gyi gzugs brnyan tsam byed pa ni snying
NK017(tsa)007:536: de dag gi mjug tu dam tshig dang sdom pa'i
NK017(tsa)007:537: gnas thams cad bsgrags nas khas blang du gzhug cing
NK017(tsa)007:538: yon 'bul zhing gtang rag tu tshogs kyi 'khor lo
NK017(tsa)007:539: bya / shis pa brjod cing dge ba bsngo ba sogs bya ba ni mjug gi cho ga'o //
NK017(tsa)007:540: grangs med bskal pa'i yun la ma ltos bar //
NK017(tsa)007:541: tshe gcig sangs rgyas mngon byed rdo rje'i theg /
NK017(tsa)007:542: 'dod yon rgyan du shar ba'i khyad par lam //
NK017(tsa)007:543: lam mchog 'di 'dra mjal rnams skal ba bzang //
NK017(tsa)007:544: 'on kyang snyigs mar spyod pa'i gzhan dbang gis //
NK017(tsa)007:545: smin grol lam gyi zab gnad kun nub cing //
NK017(tsa)007:546: tshig tsam bon du gyer ba'i 'chol spyod kyis //
NK017(tsa)007:547: bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan lus la sems 'di skyo //
NK017(tsa)007:548: de lta na yang dam pa'i bla ma la //
NK017(tsa)007:549: bsten nas man ngag gnad kyi bcud blang ste //
NK017(tsa)007:550: tshul bzhin nyams su len pa'i mos ldan 'ga' //
NK017(tsa)007:551: yod par gyur na tshul 'dir spro bar 'gyur //
NK017(tsa)007:552: de phyir dam pa'i grogs kyi bkas bskul nas //
NK017(tsa)007:553: brjod bya'i snying po nyung ngu'i ngag gis bkod //
NK017(tsa)007:554: log par bshad dang sbas don bshad ches pa'i //
NK017(tsa)007:555: nong pa gang mchis lha dang bla mar bshags //
NK017(tsa)007:556: dge tshogs gang zhig mchis pas 'gro ba kun //
NK017(tsa)007:557: 'khrul med rdo rje theg pa'i lam bzang dang //
NK017(tsa)007:558: mjal nas smin byed dbang bzhi'i rgyud smin te //
NK017(tsa)007:559: grol byed lam gyis mngon sangs rgya bar shog /
NK017(tsa)007:560: de ltar dbang bzhi'i go don cung zad bkral ba
NK017(tsa)007:561: 'di nyid rdo rje'i mched dam tshe dbang bzang po'i
NK017(tsa)007:562: bskul ba'i nan ngor ma ldog par dug lnga me
NK017(tsa)007:563: 'bar dpal dge hral bos rgyal 'phags ri khrod du
NK017(tsa)007:564: blo thog nas shar mar bris pa dge'o //
